content: if you re looking for something quick easy cute and useful then this crochet face pad is for you the polka dot face pads are great for washing your face or taking off make-up they are made with 100% cotton yarn so they are soft against your skin and absorbent simply throw them into the wash with your towels and they will be clean and ready to use again > the free pattern for the polka dot face pad can be found ** here 1 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 2 ** > the polka dot face pad is part of the three s company face pad set - you can learn more about it ** here 3 ** **skill level ** easy / beginner **language ** english **crochet terminology ** us terms **crochet stitch ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet puff **size ** this pot holder measures 3 9 - 4 in diameter **materials ** * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 20 yds of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your face pads 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-make-the-polka-dot-crochet-face-pad/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=xpjlvyxknss&feature=youtu be 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/threes-company-face-pad-set
